Investor relations

# secfilings

info@digitalbrandsgroup.co

Los Angeles, CA

Digital Brands Group is a modern retail ecosystem; a collective reshaping the shopping experience by personalizing styled looks based on consumer preferences. We streamline brand discovery, craft unique personal style experiences and build a sustainable closet that delivers value and confidence with every wear.
